item.title: WordPress XML-RPC wp接口文档
item.description: å¤è¾¹æ ¢,å¤ä»½ä¸ wp.getUsersBlogs Retrieve the blogs of the users. Parameters string username string password Return Values array struct boolean isAdmin string url string blogid string blogName string xmlrpc wp.getTags Get list of all tags. Parameters int blog_id string username string password Return Values array struct int tag_id string name int count string slug string html_url string rss_url wp.getAuthors Get an array of users for the blog. Parameters int blog_id string username string password Return Values array struct int user_id string user_login string display_name string meta_value (Serialized PHP data) … wp.
